import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckOutSteps from '../components/CheckOutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartAction' const PaymentScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('الدفع عند الاستلام') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history.push('/placeorder') } return (

) } export default PaymentScreen
